hdr-39006.def: Percentage of the population living below the national poverty line, which is the poverty line deemed appropriate for a country by its authorities. National estimates are based on population-weighted subgroup estimates from household surveys.
hdr-39006.name: Population living below income poverty line
hdr-39006.source: World Bank. 2021. World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. Http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed July 8 2021.
hdr-39006.dataset: World Bank. 2021. World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. Http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed July 8 2021.
